text: "Centipede" is the first single by Rebbie Jackson. It is from her first record, Centipede. It was her highest charting single to date. It peaked at #4 on the Billboard R&B; charts. The song was released in 1984. It is available in three different mixes, one of them extended. Category:1984 songs Category:Pop songs
title: Centipede (song)
